entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Stony Plain
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Hazy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 25. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 23.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low 10.
